name: Arena (itch) (Hankik)
description:
The last one standing wins!
Players must collect armor from breaking open boxes and fighting mobs to prepare for the real fight. Players battle using three melee attack types that can be blocked if their opponent matches it.

Left Controls: WASD keys + XCVB keys
Right Controls: Arrow keys + M<>? keys

(picking up too much armor will slow players temporarily while they build up their stamina)
